doc:
Michael Bates (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Bates_(actor) 0 Michael Hammond Bates (4 December 1920 – 11 January 1978) was an Anglo-Indian actor. He was best known for playing the chief prison guard who processes (and strip-searches) Alex (Malcolm McDowell) in A Clockwork Orange, Cyril Blamire in Last of the Summer Wine (1973–75), and Rangi Ram in It Ain't Half Hot Mum (1974–77). Michael_Hammond_Bates ( 4_December_1920 – 11_January_1978 ) was an_Anglo-Indian_actor . He was_best_known for playing the_chief_prison_guard who processes (_and_strip-searches ) Alex_(_Malcolm_McDowell_) in A_Clockwork_Orange , Cyril_Blamire in Last of the_Summer_Wine_(_1973 – 75_) , and Rangi_Ram in It Ai n't Half_Hot_Mum_(_1974 – 77_) .
